targets.query: select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.*.5\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.GET.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.POST.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.PUT.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.DELETE.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.check_api/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.*.1\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.*.2\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.*.3\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.*.4\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$server.openstack.nova.http.*.5\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.nova-api-1.servers.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.nova-api-2.servers.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.nova-metadata-api.servers.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.nova-novncproxy.servers.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.nova-api-1.servers.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.nova-api-2.servers.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.nova-metadata-api.servers.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.backend.nova-novncproxy.servers.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.compute.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.scheduler.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.conductor.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.cert.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.consoleauth.disabled/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.compute.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.scheduler.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.conductor.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.cert.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.consoleauth.up/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.compute.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.scheduler.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.conductor.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.cert.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.services.consoleauth.down/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.instances.active/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.instances.error/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select mean(value) from /openstack.nova.instance_creation_time/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.total_used_vcpus/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.total_used_disk/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.total_used_ram/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.total_free_vcpus/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.total_free_disk/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.total_free_ram/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
